baydem 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

bd_add_shaded_quantiles()

Add a shaded region showing the min/max quantiles

bd_analyze_soln()

Analyze the result of a call to bd_do_inference

bd_assess_calib_curve_equif()

Assess the equifinality or time spans in the input radiocarbon calibration curve

bd_calc_calib_curve_equif_dates()

Calculate equifinal dates for each point in the calibration curve

bd_calc_calib_curve_frac_modern()

Calculation the calibration curve fraction taumodern for input calendar dates

bd_calc_gauss_mix_pdf()

Caculate the density of a possibly truncated Gaussian mixture

bd_calc_gauss_mix_pdf_mat()

Calculate the density of a possibly truncated Gaussian mixture for a matrix of samples

bd_calc_half_life_from_peak()

For each sample, calculate the time it takes for the density to decrease by half from the peak

bd_calc_meas_matrix()

Calculate the measurement matrix given N observations and G grid points

bd_calc_quantiles()

Calculate the quantiles for an input matrix X

bd_calc_relative_density()

Calculate the relative density at two dates (or a range of dates / the peak)

bd_calc_trapez_weights()

Calculate integration weights assuming the midpoint rule

bd_do_inference()

Do Demographic Bayesian Inference

bd_draw_rc_meas_using_date()

Simulate radiocarbon measurements from input calendar dates

bd_extract_param()

Extract the Bayesian samples for a Gaussian mixture model generated by bd_do_inference

bd_load_calib_curve()

Load Calibration Curve

bd_make_blank_density_plot()

Prepare a blank plot for showing densities

bd_phi2tau()

Find calendar date from fraction modern value given known bounding indices

bd_plot_50_percent_quantile()

Plot the 50 percent quantile curve

bd_plot_known_sim_density()

Plot the known simulation density

bd_plot_summed_density()

Plot the summed probability density function (SPDF)

bd_sample_trunc_exp()

Sample from a truncated exponential distribution

bd_summarize_trunc_gauss_mix_sample()

Identify growth periods and the peak value for a truncated Gaussian mixture

bd_vis_calib_curve()

Visualize the calibration curve with equifinal and non-equifinal time spans

intcal13

The IntCal13 calibration curve

intcal13_raw

The raw data for constructing the IntCal13 calibration curve

marine13

The Marine13 calibration curve

marine13_raw

The raw data for constructing the Marine13 calibration curve

shcal13

The SHCal13 Southern Hemisphere atmospheric radiocarbon calibration curve

shcal13_raw

The raw data for constructing the SHCal13 Southern Hemisphere atmospheric calibration curve

  • All functions
